sentences.en: A dynamical angular rigidity measuring method is given based on modal analysis.
sentences.cn: 针对挠性接头角刚度的测量,提出了一种基于模态分析的动态角刚度测量方法.

sentences.en: Besides, other transport means have all been adopted, including multi - modal transportation.
sentences.cn: 而且其他运输方法也会被采用, 包括国际多 式 联运.

sentences.en: Displays a Form and specifies if the Form is modal or modeless.
sentences.cn: 显示窗体并指定该窗体是模式的还是无模式的.

sentences.en: Modal verbs generally take the bare infinitive.
sentences.cn: 情态动词通常用不带to的不定式.

sentences.en: Modeless dialogs are less common than their modal siblings.
sentences.cn: 另一种对话框称为“非模态对话框”,它不如同胞姐妹模态对话框那么常见.

sentences.en: Property dialog boxes can be either modal or modeless.
sentences.cn: 属性对话框可以是模态的,也可以是非模态的.

sentences.en: Shows the form as a modal dialog box with the specified owner.
sentences.cn: 将窗体显示为具有指定所有者的模式对话框.

sentences.en: The book contains an excellent discussion of modal logic.
sentences.cn: 这本书包含了有关模态逻辑的精彩探讨.

sentences.en: The damage quantification approach based on second - order modal division method is derived.
sentences.cn: 给出了用模态应变能变化率来评定结构损伤程度的高精度算法.

sentences.en: The designers, unlike wizards, are non-modal and hence allow you the flexibility to simultaneously work on designing different database objects.
sentences.cn: 与向导不同的是，设计程序是非模态的，因此允许您灵活地同时设计不同的数据库对象。

sentences.en: The determination of the choice of travel mode is known as modal split.
sentences.cn: 交通方式选择的确定就叫做交通方式划分.

sentences.en: The modal value is 15 because it occurs more often than any other value.
sentences.cn: 众数值是15,它出现的次数最多.

sentences.en: The results confirmed his hypothesis on the use of modal verbs.
sentences.cn: 结果证实了他的关于情态动词用法的假设.

sentences.en: There are two basic variants of palette tool behavior: modal tools and charged cursor tools.
sentences.cn: 它们的行为有两种基本类型,即模态工具和加载的光标工具.

sentences.en: They are visually very similar to modal dialog boxes, but they are functionally very different.
sentences.cn: 它们在视觉上与模态对话框非常相似, 但功能不同.

sentences.en: Visually differentiate modeless dialogs from modal dialogs.
sentences.cn: 视觉上区分非模态对话框与模态对话框.

words.tran_cn: 形式，形态；程序；物理疗法；主要的感觉

phrases.tran_cn: 模态分析；众数分析；实际分析

trans.tran_cn: 形式的，情态的，模式的，语气的
trans.tran_en: modal meanings are concerned with the attitude of the speaker to the hearer or to what is being said
